fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit a player to watch over. Gain a shell for each non-evil player who visits them.
- At night, spend a shell and choose an Unseen player. You will shoot all their non-Unseen visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Retain shells upon being converted. If not converted, start with 0 shells.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
